name: Smartwool Sneakers No Show Socks - Women's
description: Merino wool keeps these socks fresh. The no-show cut keeps them hidden. A seamless toe and no cushion underfoot so they fit nicely in close-fitting footwear.Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability.Internal heel gripper and arch brace hold sock securely in place.Virtually Seamless™ toe won't cause hotspots or chafing.Slightly more coverage than standard no-show for added comfort.Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet.
